timeline.message: support MethodTemplate to group imports/javadoc/method to single class

timeline.bodyText: Add a MethodTemplate so things related to a method can be grouped together (import, javadoc, method signature and code).
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.message: only add these methods for lite

timeline.bodyText: Desirable to automatically infer all (or most) of these import classes from code itself.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft
